name: Mercenape
description:
Mercenape is a sci-fi action game developed by Team Mercenape. In the game, you play as Kesh, a mercenary from the race space-traveling apes. He is sent to the Lost Planet, - a haven to ruins of a fallen civilization overran by mysterious beasts. You defeat waves of enemies in different areas of the planet.  (Currently, only one area, Level 1 is implemented.)

The agile ape that Kesh is uses his movement to outmaneuver enemies that would otherwise overwhelm him. Jumping, blocking, climbing, using the environment for his advantage, etc. 

You collect value from the slain enemies to purchase new weapons with different features. The weapons can be upgraded with rare drops from the enemies.

The game also tells the story of Kesh and his fellow Star Apes through cutscenes. 

The build provided here is still in beta version and not complete yet.  The development is paused for now, but we will get back to it someday.

How to play:

W: Climb

A/D: Move left/right

Space: Jump (when standing) / Get up (when knocking down)

Left mouse: Attack

Right mouse: Block

Mouse wheel: Zoom in & out
